articles.content: Marvel Studios head honcho Kevin Feige has weighed in on the possibility of an Avengers spinoff fro the Young Avengers, forming in the Marvel Cinematic Universe. Though, as is often the case with Fei… [+2795 chars]

articles.title: Read the letter Beyonce sent to Taylor Swift after Grammys - Los Angeles Times
articles.description: Taylor Swift hailed Beyoncé as "queen of grace" after the "Black Parade" artist sent a sweet letter congratulating the "Cardigan" singer on Grammys.
articles.content:
To Taylor Swift, Queen Bey is also the queen of grace & greatness.
Swift thanked Beyoncé Friday on Instagram for a beautiful floral arrangement and note the Black Is King artist sent after both … [+2428 chars]
